biotools.summary: Predict the local structure of a protein in terms of backbone dihedral angle domains, identify sequence regions that form early during folding, and locate structural weaknesses, defined as regions whose sequence is not optimal with respect to the tertiary fold.

bioschemas.name: Prelude Fugue
bioschemas.summary: Predict the local structure of a protein in terms of backbone dihedral angle domains, identify sequence regions that form early during folding, and locate structural weaknesses, defined as regions whose sequence is not optimal with respect to the tertiary fold.
